mapper.select: SELECT id, quality_code AS qualityCode, troop_type AS troopType, slot_index AS slotIndex, type, base_attack AS baseAttack, base_defense AS baseDefense, base_valor AS baseValor, base_command AS baseCommand, base_dodge AS baseDodge, base_mobility AS baseMobility, base_power AS basePower, sort_order AS sortOrder, is_virtual AS isVirtual FROM general_slot WHERE id = #{id}
